name: nuxt-openapi-docs-module
description: A plugin for Nuxt.js to generate pages from OpenAPI specifications

scripts.reinstall:2: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json .nuxt && npm i && cd example && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json .nuxt && npm i
scripts.reinstall:3: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json .nuxt && npm i && cd example3 && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json .nuxt && npm i
scripts.example:2: cd example && rm -rf dist .output && npm run generate && cd .. && rm -rf docs && mv example/dist docs && rm -rf example/dist && git add docs
scripts.example:3: cd example3 && rm -rf dist .output && npm run generate && cd .. && rm -rf docs && mv example3/.output/public docs && rm -rf example3/.output example3/dist example3/.nuxt && git add docs
